property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Fire or Nature creature (When one of your Fire or Nature creatures attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.)

property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into their mana zone.
